summary: A corrupt, junkie cop with bipolar disorder attempts to manipulate his way through a promotion in order to win back his wife and daughter while also fighting his own inner demons.
cast: James McAvoy|Jamie Bell|Eddie Marsan|Imogen Poots|Brian McCardie|Emun Elliott|Gary Lewis|John Sessions|Shauna Macdonald|Jim Broadbent|Joanne Froggatt|Kate Dickie|Martin Compston|Iain De Caestecker|Shirley Henderson|Joy McAvoy|Jordan Young|Pollyanna McIntosh|Bobby Rainsbury|Michael Moreland|Therese Bradley|Zack Niizato|Robin Laing|Franziska Altmeyer|Ron Donachie|Tracy Ann Oberman|Mitchell Mullen|Jake Wilson|Luke MacDonald|Jodie Mccallum|Chris Young|Jonathan Watson|David Soul|Chris Cameron|Lauren Maddox|Natasha O'Keeffe|Chidi Chickwe|Sanjeev Kohli|Neil D'Souza|Vanda Dadras|Jamie Wallace|Trudie Styler|Megan Finn|Colin Healy|China Soul|Emma Bryant|Craig Garner|Gregor Gillespie|Sofie Gällerspång|Christian Kinell|Maxwell Laird|Lars-Peter Larsson|Andrew Martin|J. Scott Murray
title: Filth, el sucio
